00044 /*
00045  * GCC produces warnings when using pack to set alignment, define the
00046  * reset and set macro to nothing to silence the warning. AVR arch does not
00047  * care about alignment anyway.
00048  */
00049 #define COMPILER_PACK_RESET(alignment)
00050 #define COMPILER_PACK_SET(alignment)
